This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Fixed a broken Snagit link in documentation.

- Improved link error handling: fixed line number calculation for AUTOTITLE links and enhanced error messages.
- Added tests for accurate link error line reporting.
- Updated OpenAPI schemas: reordered `descriptionHTML`/`statusCodes` fields and revised descriptions.
